privacy policy text: You accept the terms of use and acknowledge the privacy notice
delete account text 1:
The process is simple, but it‚Äôs still hard for us to say goodbye.
We will deactivate your account first, and within 30 days your information will be removed from our systems.
delete account text 2: For legal reasons, we retain some of your data even after account deletion. Read our privacy policy to learn more about what we keep and why. If you want all your data to be deleted, contact us.
delete account description:
Are you sure you want to delete the account linked to the email "{{email}}"?
This action will be irreversible.

tutorial 1 description:
Pee Together is a unique and fun app that lets you track your bathroom visits in a playful and social way.

Every time you pee, press the button to log the moment and discover the magic!
tutorial 2 description:
Pee Together is even more fun with friends!

Add your friends and share the experience with them. Who has the most active bladder?
tutorial 3 description:
Challenge your friends and see who has peed the most!

Who will be the real champion?
tutorial 4 description:
Explore the 'pee map' and see all the places where you‚Äôve peed!

Relive unforgettable moments and discover new places!
tutorial 5 description:
Complete challenges and unlock new badges!

Become the pee king!
tutorial disclaimer description:
Pee Together is an app created for fun and playful tracking of your bathroom visits.
It is not intended to provide medical advice, monitor health, or replace medical evaluations.

Do not rely on the app for managing health conditions or making medical decisions.

Always consult a doctor or a qualified healthcare professional for any health-related concerns.
you do not have location permission: You have not enabled location permissions
